pkgmetadata.longdescription: Functions for Set-Theoretic Multi-Method Research and Advanced QCA // This initiated as a package companion to the book by C. Q. Schneider and C. Wagemann "Set-Theoretic Methods for the Social Sciences", Cambridge University Press. It grew to include functions for performing set-theoretic multi-method research, QCA for clustered data, theory evaluation, and Enhanced Standard Analysis. Additionally it includes data to replicate the examples in the book and in the online appendix.
